gurmukhi: keI plt sUrj isjdw krwie ]pRB eyk rUp dÍY kY lKwie ]4]234]
transliteration: Kaee Palat Sooraj Sijdaa Karaae|| Prabh Ek Roop Dvai Kai Lakhaae||4||234||
translation: Many prostrate towards the west (opposite side of sunrise).They consider the Lord as dual, who is actually one. 4.234.

gurmukhi: AniC`j qyj AnBY pRkws ]dwqw durMq AdÍY Anws ]
transliteration: Anchhijj Tej Anbhai Prakaas|| Daataa Durant Advai Anaas||
translation: His Glory is Unassailable and His illumination is devoid of fear. He is Infinite Donor, Non-dual and Indestructible.

gurmukhi: sB rog sog qy rhq rUp ]AnBY Akwl ACY srUp ]5]235]
transliteration: Sabh Rog Sog Te Rahat Roop|| Anbhai Akaal Achhai Daroop||5||235||
translation: He is an Entity devoid of all ailments and sorrows. He is Fearless, Immortal and Invincible Entity. 5.235.

gurmukhi: kruxw inDwn kwml kiRpwl ]duK doK hrq dwqw idAwl ]
transliteration: Karounaa Nidhaan Kaamal Kridaal|| Doukh Dokh Harat Daataa Diaal||
translation: He is treasure of sympathy and perfectly Merciful. He the Donor and Merciful Lord removes all sufferings and blemishes.

gurmukhi: AMjn ibhIn AnBMj nwQ ]jl Ql pRBwau srcqR swQ ]6]236]
transliteration: Anjan Bihoon Anbhanj Naath|| Jal Thal Prabhaao Sarbatra Saath||6||236||
translation: He is without the impact of maya and is an Infrangible. Lord, His Glory pervades in water and on land and is the companion of all.6.236.

gurmukhi: ijh jwq pwq nhI Byd Brm ]ijh rMg rUp nhI eyk Drm ]
transliteration: Jih Jaat Paat Nahoo Bhed Bharam|| Jih Ran Roop Nahoo Ek Dharam||
translation: He is without caste, lineage, contrast and illusion, He is without colour, form and special religious discipline.

gurmukhi: ijh sqR imqR dyaU eyk swr ]A`CY srUp Aibcl Apwr ]7]237]
transliteration: Jih Satra Mitra Dooo Ek Saar|| Achchhai Saroopabichal Apaar||7||237||
translation: For Him the enemies and friends are the same. His invincible form is Everlasting and Infinite. 7.237.

gurmukhi: jwnI n jwie ijh rUp ryK ]kih bws qws kih kaun ByK ]
transliteration: Jaani Na Jaae Jih Roop Rekh|| Kah(i) Baas Taas Kah(i) Kaoun Bhekh||
translation: His form and mark cannot be known. Where doth He live? And what is His garb?

gurmukhi: kih nwm qws hY kvn jwq ]ijh sqR imqR nhI puqR BRwq ]8]238]
transliteration: Kah(i) Naam Taas Hai Kavan Jaat|| Jih Satra Mitra Nahi Poutra Bhraat||8||238||
translation: What is His Name? and what is His caste? He is without any enemy, friend, son and brother. 8.238.

gurmukhi: kruxw inDwn kwrx srUp ]ijh ckR ichn nhI rMg rUp ]
transliteration: Karounaa Nidhaan Kaaran Daroop|| Jih Charka Chihan Nahi Ran Roop||
translation: He is the treasure of Mercy and the cause of all causes. He hath no mark, sign, colour and form.

gurmukhi: ijh Kyd Byd nhI krm kwl ]sB jIv jMq kI krq ]pwl ]9]239]
transliteration: Jih Khed Bhed Nahoo Karam Kaal|| Sabh Jeev  Jant Koo Karat Paal||9||239||
translation: He is without suffering, action and death. He is the Sustainer of all the beings and creatures. 9.239.

gurmukhi: aurDM ibrhq suDM srUp ]bu`DM Apwl ju`DM AnUp ]
transliteration: Urdhan Birhat Sudhan Daroop|| Buddhan Apaal Juddhan Anoop||
translation: He is the loftiest, biggest and Perfect Entity. His intellect is boundless and is unique in warfare.

gurmukhi: ijh rUp ryK nhI rMg rwg ]AniC`j qyj AniB`j Adwg ]10]240]
transliteration: Jih Roop Rekh Nahoo Ran Raag|| Anchhijj Tej Anbhijj Adaag||10||240||
translation: He is without form, line, colour and affection. His Glory is Unassailable, Unappeasable and stainless. 10.240.

gurmukhi: jl Ql mhIp bn qn durMq ]ijh nyiq nyiq ins idn aucrMq ]
transliteration: Jal Thal Mahoop Ban Tan Durant|| Jih Net(i) Nis Din Ouchrant||
translation: He is the king of waters and lands; He, the Infinite Lord pervades the forests and the blades of grass. He is called ‘Neti, Neti’ (Not this, Not this…Infinite) night and day.
